author: Eric Niiler
title: The US Army's Virus Research Lab Gears Up to Fight Covid-19
description: The Pentagon's Institute of Infectious Diseases has been handling the world’s most dangerous organisms for decades. Now they're researching the new coronavirus.
content: The cinder block hallways inside the US Armys top virus research lab are punctuated every few feet with windows that peer into tiny offices and laboratories crammed with scientific equipment. On each doorway, orange placards with that Vulcan-looking biohazard… [+4682 chars]
